desc.en: Can the unit be allocated to a player when starting a multiplayer game (def=yes)
desc.zh: 开始多人游戏时，是否可以将单位分配给玩家（def=yes）

desc.en: number of rounds carried between reloads [-1 means unlimited] (def=-1)
desc.zh: 两次装填之间携带的子弹数 [-1 表示无限制] (def=-1)

desc.en: the armor type of this object [none,wood,light,heavy,concrete] (def=none)
desc.zh: 该物体的装甲类型 [无、木材、轻型、重型、混凝土] (def=none)

desc.en: arbitrary maximum allowed to build [per house] (def=-1 -- no restriction)
desc.zh: 每栋房屋允许建造的任意最大值（def=-1——无限制）

desc.en: Is it equipped with a cloaking device (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它是否配备了隐形装置（def=no）？

desc.en: cost to build object (in credits)
desc.zh: 建造物体的成本（以信用点为单位）

desc.en: category of object [used by AI systems -- "Soldier", "Civilian", "VIP", "Ship", "Recon", "AFV", "IFV", "LRFS", "Support", "Transport", "AirPower", "AirLift"]
desc.zh: 物体类别[AI 系统使用 - “士兵”、“平民”、“VIP”、“舰船”、“侦察”、“AFV”、“IFV”、“LRFS”、“支援”、“运输”、“空中力量”、“空运”]

desc.en: Does the unit cloak when stopped moving (def=no)?
desc.zh: 当单位停止移动时，它是否会隐形（def=no）？

desc.en: Does it contain a crew that can escape [never infantry] (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它是否包含可以逃脱的人员[从不步兵]（def=no）？

desc.en: Does it change capabilites based on a gunner that has been added. (def=no)
desc.zh: 它是否会根据已添加的炮手改变能力？（def=no）

desc.en: sound to play if this object type is crushed (def=none)
desc.zh: 当该物体类型被压碎时播放的声音（def=none）

desc.en: This unit can fire when deployed. (def=no)
desc.zh: 该单位部署后即可开火。（def=no）

desc.en: Index of weapon to fire while deployed.  0 or 1.  (def=1)
desc.zh: 部署时发射的武器索引。0 或 1。（def=1）

desc.en: time, in minutes, to deploy or undeploy [if this object can do so]
desc.zh: 部署或取消部署的时间（以分钟为单位）[如果此对象可以这样做]

desc.en: Yes if damage to the unit reduces its ammo (because the ammo explodes or becomes detargeted, or whatever) (def=no)
desc.zh: 是的，如果对单位的伤害会减少其弹药（因为弹药爆炸或失去目标，或其他原因）（def=no）

desc.en: Can this object be disabled by special multiplay option (def=yes)?
desc.zh: 是否可以通过特殊的多重播放选项禁用该对象（def=yes）？

desc.en: whether the unit continually retargets nearby units and fires at all of them (def=no)
desc.zh: 该单位是否持续重新瞄准附近的单位并向所有单位开火（def=no）

desc.en: Can be built/owned by all countries in a multiplayer game (def=no)?
desc.zh: 是否可以由多人游戏中的所有国家建造/拥有（def=no）？

desc.en: Frames before first reload occurs when unit is empty. -1 means use standard reload time. (def=-1)
desc.zh: 当单位为空时，第一次重新加载之前的帧数。-1 表示使用标准重新加载时间。（def=-1）

desc.en: Does it explode violently when destroyed [i.e., does it do collateral damage] (def=no)?
desc.zh: 被摧毁时是否会发生剧烈爆炸 [即，是否会造成附带损害]（def=no）？

desc.en: the explosion to use when it blows up [doesn't apply to infantry] (def=none)
desc.zh: 爆炸时使用的爆炸方式[不适用于步兵]（def=none）

desc.en: pitch of projectile launch and barrel [0 = horizontal, 64 = vertical] (def=50)
desc.zh: 射弹发射和枪管的倾斜度 [0 = 水平, 64 = 垂直] (def=50)

desc.en: Is this building a gate? (def=no)
desc.zh: 这座建筑是大门吗？（def=否）

desc.en: time, in minutes, to delay before closing a gate after it has opened.
desc.zh: 大门打开后关闭前的延迟时间（分钟）。

desc.en: distance to scan for enemies to attack (def=use weapon range)
desc.zh: 扫描敌人攻击的距离（def=使用武器范围）

desc.en: name of graphic data to use for this object (def=same as object identifier)
desc.zh: 用于此对象的图形数据的名称（def=与对象标识符相同）

desc.en: Is this object immune to damage
desc.zh: 此物体是否能免疫伤害

desc.en: Is the unit immune to psionics (def=yes for buildings, no for others)?
desc.zh: 该单位是否对心灵感应免疫（对于建筑物为肯定免疫，对于其他单位为否定免疫）？

desc.en: Is the unit immune to radiation (def=no)?
desc.zh: 该装置是否不受辐射影响（def=no）？

desc.en: Is it immune to vein creature attacks (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它是否对静脉生物攻击免疫（def=no）？

desc.en: number of rounds the unit starts with. -1 means it starts full. (def=-1)
desc.zh: 单位初始回合数。-1 表示初始回合数为满。(def=-1)

desc.en: Is completely and always invisible to enemy (def=no)?
desc.zh: 对敌人来说是否完全且始终隐形（def=no）？

desc.en: Will this object not be announed when destroyed (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这个物体被销毁时不会被宣告吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Is this allowed to be a combat target (def=yes)?
desc.zh: 这可以作为战斗目标吗（def=yes）？

desc.en: specifies the given name (displayed) for the object
desc.zh: 指定对象的名称（显示）

desc.en: Always use the given name rather than generic "enemy object" (def=no)?
desc.zh: 总是使用给定的名称而不是通用的“敌方对象”（def=no）？

desc.en: Doesn't ever have to rotate to fire. (def=no)
desc.zh: 无需旋转即可射击。（def=no）

desc.en: Can fire at targets while performing other actions, like moving. (def=no).
desc.zh: 可以在执行其他动作（例如移动）时向目标射击。（def=no）。

desc.en: who can build this [GDI or Nod] (def=none)
desc.zh: 谁可以建造这个[GDI 或 Nod]（def=无）

desc.en: what to base pip display on [Passengers, Tiberium, Ammo, Power] (def=none)
desc.zh: 点显示依据 [乘客、泰伯利亚、弹药、电力] (def=none)

desc.en: how many pips to draw before wrapping (def=none)
desc.zh: 包裹前要绘制多少个点（def=none）

desc.en: point value for scoring purposes (def=0)
desc.zh: 用于计分的分值（默认=0）

desc.en: list of buildings needed before this can be manufactured (def=no requirement)
desc.zh: 制造前所需建筑物的清单（def=无要求）

desc.en:
Does this unit know how to do attack-move? (def=<yes, if it has a weapon>)
Can be used to override attack move on units that shouldn't for various reasons.
desc.zh:
此单位是否知道如何进行攻击移动？（默认值：<是，如果它拥有武器>）
可用于覆盖由于各种原因不应执行攻击移动的单位。

desc.en:
Does this unit know how to do auto-deploy? (def=<yes, if the unit support deploying>)
Can be used to override auto deploy on units that deploy.
desc.zh:
此单位是否知道如何进行自动部署？（默认值为<是，如果该单位支持部署>）
可用于覆盖已部署单位的自动部署。

desc.en: primary weapon equipped with (def=none)
desc.zh: 主要武器装备（def=none）

desc.en: secondary weapon equipped with (def=none)
desc.zh: 副武器装备（def=none）

desc.en: new primary weapon when at elite veteran status (def=same as primary)
desc.zh: 精英老兵身份时的新主要武器（防御=与主要武器相同）

desc.en: new secondary weapon when at elite veteran status (def=same as secondary)
desc.zh: 精英老兵状态下的新辅助武器（防御=与辅助武器相同）

desc.en: Is visible on radar even if insignificant and unowned --gs rewrote to be useful for something
desc.zh: 即使不重要且无人拥有，也可以在雷达上看到--gs 重写以用于某些用途

desc.en: Rate Of Turn for body (if present) and turret (if present) (def=0)
desc.zh: 机身（如果存在）和炮塔（如果存在）的转弯速率（def=0）

desc.en: Used to tweak the amount by which damage reduces readiness. 0 cancels the readiness reduction. (def=0)
desc.zh: 用于调整伤害降低准备度的量。0 表示取消准备度降低。（def=0）

desc.en: time delay between reloads (def=0)
desc.zh: 重新加载之间的时间延迟（def=0）

desc.en: amount to add at every ((MaxAmmo / PipWrap) %0) increment. Used to slow reload rate increasingly. (def=0)
desc.zh: 每 ((MaxAmmo / PipWrap) %0) 增量添加的量。用于逐渐降低装填速度。(def=0)

desc.en: Is it invisible on radar maps (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它在雷达地图上不可见吗（def=no）？

desc.en:
If this unit has a radial firing pattern, this determines the number
of segments. This starts at the unit's left and goes right over 180 degrees.  (def=0)
desc.zh:
如果此单位具有径向射击模式，则此参数决定了
射击段的数量。该模式从单位左侧开始，向右延伸 180 度。（默认值为 0）

desc.en: Does the object heal automatically up to half strength (def=no)?
desc.zh: 物体是否会自动恢复至一半强度（def=no）？

desc.en: Can this object be selected by the player (def=yes)?
desc.zh: 玩家可以选择该物体吗（def=yes）？

desc.en: Has sensors to detect nearby cloaked objects (def=no)?
desc.zh: 是否有传感器来探测附近的隐形物体（def=no）？

desc.en: sight range, in cells (def=1)
desc.zh: 视野范围，以单元格为单位（def=1）

desc.en: amount of space unit takes up in cargo hold (def=1)
desc.zh: 单位在货舱中占用的空间量（def=1）

desc.en: Max size of unit a transport can carry (def=0) (Size is inclusive. Limit 3 holds 3)
desc.zh: 运输工具可携带的最大单位尺寸（默认=0）（尺寸包含在内。限制 3 保留 3）

desc.en: the number of 'bails' this building or unit can store (def=0)
desc.zh: 该建筑或单位可存储的“保释金”数量（def=0）

desc.en: strength (hit points) of this object
desc.zh: 该物体的强度（生命值）

desc.en: Does it have a targeting laser (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它有瞄准激光吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Can this object become veteran by experience (def=yes, buildings def=no)?
desc.zh: 该物体能否通过经验成为老手（def=是，建筑物def=否）？

desc.en: Is it equipped with a turret like superstructure [never infantry] (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它是否配备了类似炮塔的上层建筑 [从不步兵] (def=no)？

desc.en: Does the turret just sit and spin [only if turret equipped] (def=no)?
desc.zh: 炮塔是否会静止并旋转 [仅当配备炮塔时] (def=no)？

desc.en: tech level required to build this [-1 means can't build] (def=-1)
desc.zh: 建造此建筑所需的技术水平 [-1 表示无法建造] (def=-1)

desc.en: Should friendly units come to rescue if under attack [computer only] (def=no)?
desc.zh: 如果受到攻击，友军是否应该前来救援 [仅限计算机] (def=no)？

desc.en: Immune to damage from same type objects if owned by same side?
desc.zh: 如果属于同一方，是否可以免疫来自同一类型物体的伤害？

desc.en: The time it takes before a unit automatically undeploys. (def=-1)
desc.zh: 单位自动取消部署所需的时间。（def=-1）

desc.en: list of voices when selecting this object (def=none)
desc.zh: 选择此对象时的声音列表（def=none）

desc.en: list of voices to use when giving object a movement order (def=none)
desc.zh: 为对象发出移动命令时使用的声音列表（def=none）

desc.en: list of voices to use when giving object an attack order (def=none)
desc.zh: 向对象发出攻击命令时使用的声音列表（def=none）

desc.en: list of voices to use when it dies (def=none)
desc.zh: 死亡时使用的声音列表（def=none）

desc.en: list of voices that may give when taking damage (def=none)
desc.zh: 受到伤害时可能发出的声音列表（def=none）

desc.en: CLSID of the object handling movement for this object (def=statue)
desc.zh: 处理此对象的移动的对象 CLSID（def=statue）

desc.en: list of veteran abilities to grant (def=none)
desc.zh: 授予老兵能力的列表（def=none）

desc.en:
list of elite abilities to grant cumulative with veteran abilities (def=none)
[FASTER,STRONGER,FIREPOWER,SCATTER,ROF,SIGHT,
CLOAK,TIBERIUM_PROOF,VEIN_PROOF,SELF_HEAL,EXPLODES,
RADAR_INVISIBLE,SENSORS,FEARLESS,C4,TIBERIUM_HEAL,
GUARD_AREA,CRUSHER]
desc.zh:
精英技能列表，可与老兵技能叠加使用（默认=无）
[更快、更强、火力、散射、射速、视野、
隐形、防泰伯利亚金属、防静脉、自我治疗、爆炸、
雷达隐形、传感器、无畏、C4、泰伯利亚金属治疗、
警戒区、碾压者]

desc.en: When the AI needs a representative from a team to make a pathfinding or targeting decision it will pick the one with the highest score (def = 5)
desc.zh: 当 AI 需要团队代表来做出寻路或目标决策时，它会选择得分最高的人（def = 5）

desc.en: Allowed to move into a shrouded cell (def=yes, aircraft def=no)?
desc.zh: 是否允许进入笼罩式房间（def=是，飞机 def=否）？

desc.en: preferred docking building [e.g., harvester -> refinery, helicopter -> helipad] (def=none)
desc.zh: 首选停靠建筑 [例如，收割机 -> 炼油厂，直升机 -> 直升机停机坪] (def=none)

desc.en: Does it heal slowly when in Tiberium field (def=no)?
desc.zh: 在泰伯利亚矿场中它会慢慢痊愈吗（def=no）？

desc.en: number of passengers it may carry (def=0)
desc.zh: 可载客数量（def=0）

desc.en: speed of this object [n/a for buildings] (def=0)
desc.zh: 该物体的速度[建筑物不适用]（def=0）

desc.en: Must this object reload by coordinating with reloader building (def=no)?
desc.zh: 该对象是否必须通过与重新加载器构建协调来重新加载（def=no）？

desc.en: walking animation rate [larger means slower] (def=1)
desc.zh: 行走动画速率[越大表示越慢]（def=1）

desc.en: Does this unit get selected by the select all combatants key? (def=no)
desc.zh: 该单位是否通过选择所有战斗人员键进行选择？（def=否）

desc.en: Is not prone to fear (def=no)?
desc.zh: 不容易感到恐惧（def=no）？

desc.en: list of idle voices (def=none)
desc.zh: 空闲声音列表（def=none）

desc.en: color of pip when inside a transport [green,yellow,white,red,blue] (def=green)
desc.zh: 传输过程中点的颜色 [绿色、黄色、白色、红色、蓝色]（def=绿色）

desc.en: Equipped with building sabotage explosives [presumes Infiltrate is true] (def=no)?
desc.zh: 配备建筑破坏炸药 [假定渗透为真] (def=no)？

desc.en: Does it require special cyborg death handling (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它是否需要特殊的机器人死亡处理（def=no）？

desc.en: Is it inherently afraid and will panic easily (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它是否天生就害怕并且容易惊慌失措（肯定不是）？

desc.en: Is it immune to tiberium and tiberium gas damage (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它是否不受泰矿和泰矿气体伤害（def=no）？

desc.en: Can it enter a building like a spy or thief (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它能像间谍或小偷一样进入建筑物吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Should special case dog logic be applied to this?
desc.zh: 是否应该将特殊情况的狗逻辑应用于此？

desc.en: Counts a civilian for evac and kill tracking (def=no)?
desc.zh: 是否将平民计入撤离和杀戮追踪（def=no）？

desc.en: Uses the civilian female voice (def=no)?
desc.zh: 使用平民女性声音（def=no）？

desc.en: Does it behave like an engineer as far as repair and capture go (def=no)?
desc.zh: 就修复和捕获而言，它的行为是否像工程师（def=no）？

desc.en: Is it disguised as enemy soldier when seen by enemy (def=no)?
desc.zh: 当被敌人发现时，它是否伪装成敌军士兵（def=no）？

desc.en: Does this infantry gather information if it enters an enemy building [like a spy] (def=no)?
desc.zh: 如果步兵进入敌方建筑，它会收集情报吗？[像间谍一样]（def=no）？

desc.en: Does it steal money if it infiltrates an enemy building (def=no)?
desc.zh: 如果它渗透到敌人的建筑物中，它会偷钱吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Does it steal enemy vehicles when it gets close to one (def=no)?
desc.zh: 当它接近敌方车辆时，它会偷走敌方车辆吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Deploys like NOD artillery from TibSun. (def=no)
desc.zh: 像 TibSun 的 NOD 火炮一样部署。（def=no）

desc.en: the number of turrets the unit has (def=0)
desc.zh: 单位拥有的炮塔数量（def=0）

desc.en: the name of the weapon to be thought of as weaponX (where X is an integer) (def=none)
desc.zh: 被视为武器X的武器名称（其中X为整数）（def=none）

desc.en: the number of the weapon for this turret (as indicated by the WeaponX parameter), where Y is the name of swapping factor for the turret (def=none)
desc.zh: 此炮塔的武器编号（由 WeaponX 参数指示），其中 Y 是炮塔交换因子的名称（def=none）

desc.en: whether this unit multiplexes tooltips based on its current turret. (def=no)
desc.zh: 此单位是否根据其当前炮塔复用工具提示。（def=no）

desc.en: Can it appear out of a crate in multiplay (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它可以在多人游戏中从板条箱中出现吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Can it be crushed by a heavy tracked vehicle (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它能被重型履带式车辆压碎吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Is this vehicle able to crush infantry (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这辆车能够击溃步兵吗（def=no）？

desc.en: The vehicle does not need to stop before it can fire (def=yes)?
desc.zh: 车辆不需要停下来就可以开火（def=yes）？

desc.en: The vehicle must deploy before it can fire (def=no)?
desc.zh: 车辆必须先部署才能发射（def=no）？

desc.en: Does the special Tiberium harvesting rules apply (def=no)?
desc.zh: 是否适用特殊的泰伯利亚采掘规则（def=no）？

desc.en: Does the special weed-harvesting rules apply (def=no)?
desc.zh: 是否适用特殊的除草规则（def=no）？

desc.en: Does it deploy before being able to operate (def=no)? OBSOLETE
desc.zh: 它是否在能够操作之前就部署了（def=no）？已过时

desc.en: Does this unit tilt on slopes (def=yes)?
desc.zh: 该装置在斜坡上倾斜吗（def=yes）？

desc.en: Might this unit drop a crate when it is destroyed (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这个单位被摧毁时会掉落一个板条箱吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Can it tote vehicles around (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它可以运送车辆吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Can this aircraft land on the map (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这架飞机可以在地图上着陆吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Throttle setting at which aircraft pitch forward (def=.25)
desc.zh: 飞机向前倾斜的油门设置（def=.25）

desc.en: Amount that non-FixedWing aircraft pitch forward in degrees (def=20.0)
desc.zh: 非固定翼飞机向前倾斜的度数（def=20.0）

desc.en: Amount that the aircraft rolls when turning (def=30.0)
desc.zh: 飞机转弯时的滚转量（def=30.0）

desc.en: distance allowed to place from other buildings (def=1)
desc.zh: 允许与其他建筑物放置的距离（def=1）

desc.en: Considered for building adjacency checks (def=yes)?
desc.zh: 是否考虑建立邻接检查（def=yes）？

desc.en: Use barrel explosion logic when it is destroyed (def=no)?
desc.zh: 当它被摧毁时使用桶爆炸逻辑（def=no）？

desc.en: Does the building have a bib built in (def=no)?
desc.zh: 建筑物内是否有围兜（def=no）？

desc.en: Can this building be infiltrated by a spy/engineer (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这座建筑物能被间谍/工程师渗透吗（肯定不能）？

desc.en: When a unit docks with this building should it unload (def=no)?
desc.zh: 当一个单位与这座建筑物对接时它是否应该卸载（def=no）？

desc.en: type of object to build [InfantryType, AircraftType, UnitType, BuildingType, VesselType] (def=none)
desc.zh: 要建造的对象类型 [InfantryType、AircraftType、UnitType、BuildingType、VesselType]（def=none）

desc.en: Is this a fake structure (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这是一个假结构吗 (def=no)？

desc.en: free unit to give this building [typically harvester with refinery] (def=none)
desc.zh: 免费为该建筑提供单位[通常是带有精炼厂的收割机]（def=none）

desc.en: power output [positive for output, negative for drain] (def=0)
desc.zh: 电源输出[正极为输出，负极为漏极]（def=0）

desc.en: Does it require power to function (def=no)?
desc.zh: 它是否需要电力才能运行（def=no）？

desc.en: Does this building give radar to owning player (def=no)?
desc.zh: 该建筑是否为拥有该建筑的玩家提供雷达（def=no）？

desc.en: Can it be repaired (def=yes)?
desc.zh: 可以修复吗（def=是）？

desc.en: Does this building reload units if they dock with it (def=no)?
desc.zh: 如果部队与该建筑物对接，该建筑物是否会重新加载部队（def=no）？

desc.en: Does this building repair units if they dock with it (def=no)?
desc.zh: 如果单位与其对接，该建筑物会修复它们吗（def=no）？

desc.en: Cannot sell this building (even if it can be built)?
desc.zh: 这栋楼不能卖吗（即使可以建）？

desc.en: Is this a wall type structure [special rules apply] (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这是墙体结构吗 [适用特殊规则] (def=no)？

desc.en: Is this building placed on water only (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这座建筑物是否仅建在水上（def=否）？

desc.en: Is the number of power-ups/upgrades that can be applied to this building (def=0)
desc.zh: 是可应用于此建筑物的升级/升级次数（def=0）

desc.en: This building is a ship yard or sub pen
desc.zh: 该建筑是船厂或潜艇码头

desc.en: This building is a SAM launcher
desc.zh: 这座建筑是 SAM 发射器

desc.en: This building is a construction yard
desc.zh: 这栋建筑是一个建筑工地

desc.en: This building is a tiberium/ore refinery
desc.zh: 该建筑是一座泰伯利亚/矿石精炼厂

desc.en: This building is a weapons factory
desc.zh: 这座建筑是一个武器工厂

desc.en: Does this building cloak objects around it?
desc.zh: 这座建筑物是否遮蔽了周围的物体？

desc.en: This building is a laser fence post and obeys the rules for a building of this type.
desc.zh: 该建筑是激光栅栏柱，遵守此类建筑的规则。

desc.en: This building radiates this amount of light (def = 0).
desc.zh: 这座建筑物辐射出这么多的光（def = 0）。

desc.en: The distance (in leptons) that this light is visible from (def=5000).
desc.zh: 该光可见的距离（以轻子为单位）（def=5000）。

desc.en: The red tint of this buildings light (def=1.0)
desc.zh: 该建筑物灯光的红色色调（def=1.0）

desc.en: The green tint of this buildings light (def=1.0)
desc.zh: 该建筑物灯光的绿色色调（def=1.0）

desc.en: The blue tint of this buildings light (def=1.0)
desc.zh: 该建筑物灯光的蓝色色调（def=1.0）

desc.en: Building cannot be seen on selected in the game, only in the editor. (def=no)
desc.zh: 在游戏中无法看到选定的建筑物，只能在编辑器中看到。（def=no）

desc.en: Building that can be upgraded by attaching this building to it
desc.zh: 可以通过将此建筑附加到其上来升级的建筑

desc.en: Amount of upgrade provided by this attachment. -1=incremental upgrade. Positive number is specific upgrade.
desc.zh: 此附件提供的升级数量。-1=增量升级。正数表示具体升级。

desc.en: Can this building heal infantry (def = no) ?
desc.zh: 这座建筑可以治疗步兵吗（默认=否）？

desc.en: Is this building an armory
desc.zh: 这座建筑是军械库吗

desc.en: Can this building ignore normal placement rules? Only use this for non-player placed buildings (def = no).
desc.zh: 此建筑可以忽略常规放置规则吗？仅适用于非玩家放置的建筑（默认为否）。

desc.en: Is this a weed collection facility (def=no)?
desc.zh: 这是一个杂草收集设施吗（def=no）？

desc.en: [override] Can be turned on/off under player control or affected by low power (def=yes)?
desc.zh: [覆盖] 可以在玩家控制下打开/关闭或受低电量影响（def=yes）吗？

desc.en: fudge for units behind cliffs showing through rocks
desc.zh: 为悬崖后面的单位制作软糖，使其透过岩石显现出来

desc.en: fudge for units behind bridge overpass support columns
desc.zh: 桥梁立交桥支撑柱后面单位的软糖

desc.en: fudge for unit behind tunnel entrances
desc.zh: 隧道入口后面单位的欺骗

desc.en: fudge for tall units when they are under a bridge... eg mammoth mk2
desc.zh: 当高大的单位在桥下时，它们会变得软弱……例如猛犸象 mk2

desc.en: It can be repaired with an engineer but not with the wrench tool once 'captured'
desc.zh: 它可以由工程师修复，但一旦“捕获”就不能用扳手工具修复

desc.en: Basic UC flag
desc.zh: 基本 UC 标志

desc.en: Twiddle number
desc.zh: 旋转数

desc.en: These two can't be global since types are read in before globals.  Please keep order as well
desc.zh: 这两个不能是全局变量，因为类型变量在全局变量之前读取。请保持顺序

desc.en: yes Means that when built or captured, a radar event is generated (def=no)
desc.zh: 是 表示建造或捕获时会生成雷达事件（def=no）

desc.en: crates can never exceed this quantity
desc.zh: 板条箱数量不得超过此数量

desc.en: crates are normally one per human player but never below this number
desc.zh: 每个人类玩家通常只能获得一个箱子，但数量不会低于这个数字

desc.en: radius (cells) for area effect crate powerup bonuses
desc.zh: 区域效果箱强化奖励的半径（单元格）

desc.en: average minutes between random powerup crate regeneration
desc.zh: 随机能量箱再生之间的平均分钟数

desc.en: solo play silver crate bonus
desc.zh: 单人游戏银箱奖励

desc.en: money to give for money crate in solo play missions
desc.zh: 单人游戏任务中用来换钱箱的钱

desc.en: specifies specific unit type for unit type crate ['none' means pick randomly]
desc.zh: 为单位类型箱指定特定的单位类型['none'表示随机选择]

desc.en: solo play wood crate bonus
desc.zh: 单人游戏木箱奖励

desc.en: solo play water crate bonus
desc.zh: 单人游戏水箱奖励

desc.en: heal crate sound effect
desc.zh: 治疗箱音效

desc.en: wood crate overlay image to use
desc.zh: 要使用的木箱覆盖图像

desc.en: normal crate overlay image to use
desc.zh: 要使用的正常板条箱覆盖图像

desc.en: Water crate image
desc.zh: 水箱图像

desc.en: Give free MCV from crate if no buildings but still has money [multiplay only]?
desc.zh: 如果没有建筑物但仍有钱，请从板条箱中免费赠送 MCV [仅限多人游戏]？
